articles.author: Alberto Nardelli
articles.title: Europe’s Nightmare Is Here: They Have to Fight Putin Without the US - Bloomberg
articles.description: The Oval Office blow up between Zelenskiy and Trump laid bare for many Europeans that something critical has broken in their relationship with Washington
articles.content:
European leaders are confronting their worst-case scenario: maybe they really are going to be dealing with a bellicose Russia alone.
When the US lined up alongside Russia and North Korea earlier thi… [+293 chars]
